text: The Mexican Empire () was the official name of independent Mexico. It was a monarchy from 1821 to 1823, when the Emperor came into conflict with Congress. The territory of the Mexican Empire included New Spain and the former Captaincy General of Guatemala. Mexico then declared itself a republic. However, it reverted to a monarchy during the Second Mexican Empire of Maximilian I of Mexico. == Other websites == *Imperial House of Mexico *Mexican Empire Category:19th century in Mexico Category:1821 establishments in North America Category:1820s disestablishments in North America Category:Former monarchies of North America
title: First Mexican Empire
